alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 23 at 2:07PM MST until November 24 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches with locally up to 7 inches. * WHERE...Western Magic Valley and Southern Twin Falls County zones. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially late tonight through the Friday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Use caution and give plenty of extra time if traveling on the I-84 or US Highway 93 corridor during the Thanksgiving holiday. For additional safety information, please visit www.weather.gov/safety/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Western Magic Valley
